description: Notification of a configuration management event as
recorded in jnxCmCfgChgEventTable.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmCfgChange JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmCfgChgEventTime t 31536000 JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmCfgChgEventDate s EXAMPLEE JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmCfgChgEventSource i 2 JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmCfgChgEventUser s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmCfgChgEventLog s EXAMPLE

description: The value of sysUpTime when the event occurred.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmCfgChgEventTime

description: The system date and time when the event occurred.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmCfgChgEventDate

description: The source of the configuration event.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmCfgChgEventSource

description: The name of the logged in user. The length is zero if
not available or not applicable.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmCfgChgEventUser

description: The log of the configuration event. The length is zero
if not available.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmCfgChgEventLog

description: Notification of the latest rescue configuration
change.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmRescueChange JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmRescueChgTime t 31536000 JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmRescueChgDate s EXAMPLEE JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmRescueChgSource i 5 JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmRescueChgUser s EXAMPLE JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmRescueChgState i 2

description: The value of sysUpTime when the rescue configuration was
last changed.
If the management subsystem was reset after the last
configuration change, this object will return 0.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmRescueChgTime

description: The date and time when the rescue configuration was last
changed.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmRescueChgDate

description: The source of the rescue configuration event.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmRescueChgSource

description: The name of the logged in user. The length is zero if
not available or not applicable.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmRescueChgUser

description: The current state of the rescue configuration.
variables.name: JUNIPER-CFGMGMT-MIB::jnxCmRescueChgState
